Traditional Europe | Trafalgar Tours | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Traditional Europe 18 Days | Amsterdam - Paris Step into a storybook as you traverse the timeless landscapes of Europe. This extraordinary journey brings together the most iconic cities, stunning natural wonders, and unforgettable cultural experiences across eight countries. From the fairy-tale canals of Amsterdam to the sun-drenched shores of the French Riviera, through the majestic Alps and the Eternal City of Rome—immerse yourself in the romance, history, and elegance of Traditional Europe. Deal Details Travel Dates March - June 2026 Sale Ends Jan 1, 2026 Priced From $9,765 per person Enquire Now Description Step into a storybook as you traverse the timeless landscapes of Europe. This extraordinary journey brings together the most iconic cities, stunning natural wonders, and unforgettable cultural experiences across eight countries. From the fairy-tale canals of Amsterdam to the sun-drenched shores of the French Riviera, through the majestic Alps and the Eternal City of Rome—immerse yourself in the romance, history, and elegance of Traditional Europe. Pricing 18 Days from $9,765* per person, twin share was $10,850 per person twin share Based on 7, 21 July 26 Departures Inclusions 17 Nights in cherry-picked hotels 17 Breakfasts, 1 Welcome Reception, 1 Lunch, 5 Dinners Sightseeing highlights: Explore Rome, Pompeii, Capri, Assisi, Florence and Paris with a Local Specialist Discover Amsterdam, Heidelberg, Colmar, Lucerne, Vaduz - the capital of Liechtenstein, Innsbruck, Venice, Sorrento, Pisa, Monaco, Nice, Saint-Paul-de-Vence, Avignon, Lyon and Beaune Visit a glassblowing factory in Venice, St. Peter's Basilica in Rome and the excavations in Pompeii See the Lorelei Rock in Rhine Valley, the Benedictine Abbey of Monte Cassino and the vineyards of Burgundy Scenic Cruise through Amsterdam's canals, along the Rhine River, by private launch to St. Mark's Square in Venice and to the Isle of Capri Highlights Be My Guest – Lunch in Tyrol: Be welcomed to the Albert's home where their family have farmed the land for generations. Enjoy a traditional Tyrolean lunch surrounded by spectacular scenery. MAKE TRAVEL MATTER ® Learn about the History and Ancient Skills of Venetian Glassblowing: Discover the ancient skill of Venetian glassblowing and play a part in preserving this traditional craft. Your visit directly supports United Nations Sustainable Development Goal 11: Sustainable Cities and Communities. Iconic Experience - Tour Capri Town: Join a Local Specialist for a guided walk through Capri’s elegant lanes and vibrant squares. Hear how this island has long attracted artists, writers and Hollywood icons. Visit historic landmarks and local boutiques, and discover how generations of islanders have lived alongside the glamour, from Roman emperors to the jet-set names of the 1950s and beyond. Itinerary Day 1 Amsterdam Day 2 Amsterdam - Cologne - Boppard - Sankt Goar - Rhineland Day 3 Rhineland - Heidleberg - Colmar - Engelberg Day 4 Engleberg - Vadz - Innsbruck Day 5 Innsbruck - Brenner Pass - Venice Day 6 Venice Day 7 Venice - Rome Day 8 Rome - Vatican City - Rome Day 9 Rome - Capri - Sorrento Day 10 Sorrento - Pompeii - Assisi Day 11 Assisi - Florence Day 12 Florence - Pisa - Monaco City - Nice Day 13 Nice - Saint-Paul-de-Vence -Nice Day 14 Nice - Avignon - Lyon Day 15 Lyon - Paris Day 16 Paris Day 17 Paris Day 18 Paris - Tour concludes Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy or family share where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, a credit card processing fee applies. World Travellers reserve the right to correct any errors or omissions at any time. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
